resources.string: To initiate reCAPTHA tap on the FAB.
Cool, You seem to be a Human. To try again, tap on FAB.
Are you sure you are a Human ? We don\'t think so. Tap on FAB to try again.
Device not connected to Internet. Check your network connection and try again.
reCAPTCHA Android Demo v1.1\nDesigned and Developed by Sumit :)
